pageContext.claim: “I was voted on the basis that we are losing so much money to Mexico in terms of jobs, factories, and plants moving to Mexico.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump, in a phone conversation with the Mexican president that was later leaked, was incorrect. Ohio and Michigan actually have lost many auto industry jobs to other states, not countries, because of union traditions. Factories have also closed because of automation and because American workers have become more productive so fewer workers are needed to make the same number of goods.
